name: Concealed Breath
text: This spell allows affected creatures to hold their breath freely without negative effects or risk of suffocation. Divide the duration evenly among all creatures touched. A creature that doesn’t need to breathe because of this spell is not at risk of drowning and is immune to effects that require breathing, such as inhaled poisons. This does not grant immunity to cloud or gas attacks that don’t require breathing. While a creature is holding its breath, it can’t speak or cast spells with a verbal component (unless it’s using Silent Spell). This spell does not prevent a creature from breathing normally; it just removes the need for the creature to breathe.
components_zh: 姿势、材料/法器 (一枚掌心大小的石头)
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 此法术可以令受术者不受窒息的危机与负面影响，自由地保持呼吸。将法术持续时间平均地分配给所有被碰触的生物。因为此法术而不需要呼吸的生物不会有溺水的风险，也免疫需要呼吸的效果，例如吸入式的毒药。这并不会让他们免疫云雾或瓦斯这些并不需要你呼吸的攻击。当一个生物保持呼吸时，他不能说话或施展带有语言成分的法术[除非他使用法术默发(Silent Spell)]。此法术不提供生物正常的呼吸能力，他只是移除生物对呼吸的需求而以。
